resources.string: Thanks for installing KiwiViewer!\n\nVisit us at www.kiwiviewer.org for more information.

The brain atlas is distributed under the Slicer license. For more information please visit http://www.slicer.org/publications/item/view/1265

 Interactions:

 -single tap a model to hide it

 -double tap a model to single it out

 -long press anywhere to show all models again

 -touch and drag the clip plane to move it

 -touch and drag the handle to rotate the clip plane

 -tap the top left corner of the screen to hide/show the clip plane

This dataset contains 44 timesteps from a simulation of a block crushing a can. The models are colored by velocity magnitude.

 Interactions:

 -touch Play to start the animation

 -while animation is paused, touch and drag up/down on the left edge of the screen to advance the animation

 -while animation is playing, touch and drag up/down on the left edge of the screen to adjust animation speed

This dataset is a CT scan of a human head. The image is displayed using three orthogonal slice planes. An isosurface of the skull is computed on the fly and displayed as a translucent surface mesh.

 Interactions:

 -touch and drag a slice plane to move it

 -double tap anywhere to toggle transparency of the skull
KiwiViewer for Android 2.2 is unable to open apk asset files greater than 1MB. Instead, you can download the data from http://www.kiwiviewer.org/data and then open it in KiwiViewer.
